name: FlyTextShadows
description: Text shadow class with type-safe access to text shadow values

values.sm: [Shadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.075), offset: Offset(0.0, 1.0), blurRadius: 0.0), Shadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.075), offset: Offset(0.0, 1.0), blurRadius: 1.0), Shadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.075), offset: Offset(0.0, 2.0), blurRadius: 2.0)]
values.md: [Shadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.1), offset: Offset(0.0, 1.0), blurRadius: 1.0), Shadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.1), offset: Offset(0.0, 1.0), blurRadius: 2.0), Shadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.1), offset: Offset(0.0, 2.0), blurRadius: 4.0)]
values.lg: [Shadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.1), offset: Offset(0.0, 1.0), blurRadius: 2.0), Shadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.1), offset: Offset(0.0, 3.0), blurRadius: 2.0), Shadow(color: Color.fromRGBO(0, 0, 0, 0.1), offset: Offset(0.0, 4.0), blurRadius: 8.0)]
